name: vite-boilerplate
description: An opinionated Vue starterplate with Vite, Vuex, and Tachyons

readme.html:
ej-vite-boilerplate

Using this template

npx degit ejfox/vite-boilerplate PROJECT_NAME
cd PROJECT_NAME
yarn

Project setup

npm install

Compiles and hot-reloads for development

npm run dev

Compiles and minifies for production

npm run build

Run your end-to-end tests

npm run test:e2e

Lints and fixes files

npm run lint

Customize configuration

See Configuration Reference.
readme.raw:
# ej-vite-boilerplate

## Using this template
```
npx degit ejfox/vite-boilerplate PROJECT_NAME
cd PROJECT_NAME
yarn
```

## Project setup
```
npm install
```

#### Compiles and hot-reloads for development
```
npm run dev
```

#### Compiles and minifies for production
```
npm run build
```

#### Run your end-to-end tests
```
npm run test:e2e
```

#### Lints and fixes files
```
npm run lint
```

### Customize configuration
See [Configuration Reference](https://cli.vuejs.org/config/).
